Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
com.example.cs213project4.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
This is an abstract class which models a Pizza and it's attributes.
